inputs.remark:
缺少 V2（BPPV 治疗）。
V3 缺少：VAST 复查结果（初次阳性→复查阴性，提示初次阳性反应可能与右侧 BPPV 相关）；深头悬位检查（阴性，排除前半规管 BPPV）；左右侧卧位检查（阴性，排除水平半规管受累）。
V4 缺少：静态姿势稳定性复评（正常，动态平面闭眼无跌倒）；摇头测试复查（video-oculography 未引出眼震，提示 VOR 功能恢复）。
DHI/THI 结果表述应修正为 "DHI 从 85 降至 4；THI 从 73 降至 24"。

logic_summary: Added V2 to record the immediate BPPV treatment session.
Updated V3 tests to include VAST recheck, Deep head-hanging, and Side-lying maneuvers as per remarks.
Updated V4 tests to include specific static stability findings, headshake test results, and corrected DHI/THI phrasing.

tests.name: Gans Repositioning Maneuver (GRM)
tests.result_summary: Performed twice; symptoms resolved in provoking position.

value.name: Vertebrobasilar Artery Screening Test (VAST) Recheck
value.result_summary: Initially positive, then negative; suggests initial positive was BPPV-related.

value.name: Functional Vestibular Testing
value.result_summary: DVA scores improved (76% horiz / 72% vert); Static postural stability normal (no fall on dynamic surface with eyes closed).

value.name: Headshake Test
value.result_summary: Video-oculography showed no nystagmus, indicating VOR recovery.

value.name: Questionnaires (DHI/THI)
value.result_summary: DHI decreased from 85 to 4; THI decreased from 73 to 24.
